sentences.en: An anonymous poet who flourished in the tenth century; painted when Impressionism was flourishing.
sentences.cn: 一位活跃在10世纪的无名诗人; 在印象主义最蓬勃的时期作画.

sentences.en: Impressionism is concerned with effect of light on a subject.
sentences.cn: 印象派涉及学科的光的影响.

sentences.en: Impressionism name from the famous monet was impression?
sentences.cn: 印象主义的名称源于莫奈的名作《日出印象》?

sentences.en: Jiax impressionism of image in the E - age compared with other period of history?
sentences.cn: 与其他历史时期相比,您对E时代有什麽印像?

sentences.en: Manet is a painter of impressionism.
She differed from early realists as much as cubism from impressionism.
sentences.cn: 她与早期那些现实主义作家不同,就象立体主义和印象主义不同一样.

sentences.en: So Impressionism is the transfer of painting from tradition to modern.
sentences.cn: 所以,印象主义是传统绘画向现代绘画的转折.

sentences.en: Some art historians have difficulty fitting Edgar Degas into a more narrowly conceived definition of Impressionism.
sentences.cn: 有些艺术史学者很难把厄德盖尔·德加完全划归比较狭义的印象派之列.

sentences.en: The painting belongs to the impressionism era.

sentences.cn: 这幅作品开创了印象派的先河.
这个构思预示着印象流派.

sentences.en: This painting approaches the styles used during post - impressionism.
sentences.cn: 这幅画作接近后印象主义时期使用的风格.

sentences.en: Unlike many of his contemporaries, Prendergast did not embrace the more conservative aspects of Impressionism.
sentences.cn: 与他的很多同代人不一样,普伦德加斯特并不信奉印象派较为保守的方面.

sentences.en: Vincent Van Gogh was a painting master of later impressionism.
sentences.cn: 文森特·凡高是后期印象主义绘画大师.

sentences.en: What do you know about Post - impressionism?
sentences.cn: 你对后印象派了解 多少 ?

words.tran_cn: 印象派的；印象主义的；给人深刻印象的
感人的；令人钦佩的；给人以深刻印象的
印象；效果，影响；压痕，印记；感想
印象主义者；印象派作家
盖印；强征；传送；给予某人深刻印象

trans.tran_cn: （绘画的）印象主义，印象派，（音乐的）印象主义
trans.tran_en: a style of painting used especially in France in the 19th century which uses colour instead of details of form to produce effects of light or feeling
